mapper.insert: insert secondHandProduct value (SP_SEQ.nextval, SPTITLE, SPPRICE, SPCONTENT, SPADDRESS, default, default, MEMBERID, CATEGORYNO, default)
mapper.update: update secondHandProduct set SP_SEQ.nextval, SPTITLE, SPPRICE, SPCONTENT, SPADDRESS, default, default, MEMBERID, CATEGORYNO, default
